subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In the third quarter, Rosevelt Colvin batted down a Chad Pennington pass and Vince Wilfork chased the ball down and pounced on it. The play set up a Patriots’ field goal by Stephen Gostkowski.
snippet: In the third quarter, Rosevelt Colvin batted down a Chad Pennington pass and Vince Wilfork chased the ball down and pounced on it. The play set up a Patriots’ field goal by Stephen Gostkowski.
